actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: To expand the boundary of the Modoc National Forest to include lands presently owned by the Bank of California, N.A. Trustee, to facilitate a land exchange with the Forest Service, and for other purposes.
short_title: Modoc National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act

summary.text: Modoc National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act - Modifies the boundary of the Modoc National Forest to include and encompass specified lands owned by the Bank of California, N.A. Trustee. Considers the boundary of the Forest, as modified by this Act, to be that boundary as of January 1, 1965, for purposes of Land and Water Conservation Fund provisions.

titles.title: Modoc National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act

To expand the boundary of the Modoc National Forest to include lands presently owned by the Bank of California, N.A. Trustee, to facilitate a land exchange with the Forest Service, and for other purposes.
